item.title: EP 70 - UFOs and Vortex Jumpers
item.itunes:title: UFOs and Vortex Jumpers
item.description:
Today we look at bad Hollywood casting choices and then explore the legal ramifications of UFO-induced radiation sickness.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

The new Predator film came out, but one scene had to be edited shortly before release. When the director casts his good friend/convicted sex offender, really, what would you think was going to happen?

Then we travel to Texas to take a car ride with two old ladies and a little kid. A lonely stretch of road, a bright light in the sky . . .no, it’s not Jesus. It’s one of the weirdest, winding UFO sightings I’ve ever found.

Links:

Twentieth Century Fox pulls scene from 'The Predator' after director Shane Black casts his friend, a registered sex offender

http://www.latimes.com/entertainment/movies/la-et-mn-the-predator-shane-black-steven-wilder-striegel-20180906-story.html

Olivia Munn says 'Predator' cast shunned her after she blew whistle on sex offender

https://www.usatoday.com/story/life/people/2018/09/09/olivia-munn-shunned-predator-cast-after-flagging-sex-offender/1248252002/

Olivia Munn Hasn't Heard From Director Shane Black in Wake of 'Predator' Controversy

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/oliva-munn-predator-casting-controversy-toronto-film-festival-1141255?utm_source=t.co&utm_medium=referral

Jimmy Savile sexual abuse scandal

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Savile_sexual_abuse_scandal

BBC banned Johnny Rotten in 1978 for telling the truth about Jimmy Savile

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=esKnWAIgpLY

What Should We Say About David Bowie and Lori Maddox?

https://jezebel.com/what-should-we-say-about-david-bowie-and-lori-maddox-1754533894

Cash-Landrum incident

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cash-Landrum_incident

Between a Beer Joint and Some kind of Highway Warning Sign: the "Classic" Cash-Landrum Case Unravels

https://badufos.blogspot.com/2013/11/between-beer-joint-and-some-kind-of.html

The Cash-Landrum Incident: Was a Nuclear Aircraft Involved?

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2015/10/the-cash-landrum-incident-was-a-nuclear-aircraft-involved/

The Cash-Landrum Incident: A Case For Critical Review? – Micah Hanks Reports

https://jimharold.com/the-cash-landrum-incident-a-case-for-critical-review-micah-hanks-reports/

Best UFO Cases Fail To Provide Credible Evidence Of ET Visitors, According To Scientific Review Panel Convened By Pro-UFO Physicist

https://www.csicop.org/specialarticles/show/klass_files_volume_53

The Cash-Landrum UFO Incident

https://science.howstuffworks.com/space/aliens-ufos/cash-landrum-ufo-incident.htm

The Cash-Landrum Case – One Of The “Most Important In History!”

https://www.ufoinsight.com/cash-landrum-case-one-important-history/

The Vortex Jumper of Sedona, Arizona

https://catapult.co/stories/the-vortex-jumper-of-sedona-arizona

Sedona Vortex Jumper Peter Gersten Wanders Home After Vortex Fails to Open

https://www.phoenixnewtimes.com/news/sedona-vortex-jumper-peter-gersten-wanders-home-after-vortex-fails-to-open-6648932

The "Madness" of Peter Gersten

https://redstarfilms.blogspot.com/2011/05/madness-of-peter-gersten.html

2012: Peter Gersten's "Leap of Faith"

https://badufos.blogspot.com/2011/02/2012-peter-gerstens-leap-of-faith.html

The Apocalypse Made Easy

https://badufos.blogspot.com/2012/11/the-apocalypse-made-easy.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
